title: Snoop!

meta.alt_txt: learn their most recently played non-silent card from this round
meta.double_alt_txt: learn every non-silent card they've played this round
meta.triple_alt_txt: learn every non-silent card they've played all game

desc:
[sn]

Target another player to learn their most recently played non-silent card from this round.

-# Silent. No public announcement will be shown when played.
